name: UIInterfaceOrientation
desc: Constants that specify the orientation of the app's user interface.

items.name: case unknown
items.desc: The orientation of the device is unknown.

items.name: case portrait
items.desc: The device is in portrait mode, with the device upright and the Home button on the bottom.

items.name: case portraitUpsideDown
items.desc: The device is in portrait mode but is upside down, with the device upright and the Home button at the top.

items.name: case landscapeLeft
items.desc: The device is in landscape mode, with the device upright and the Home button on the left.

items.name: case landscapeRight
items.desc: The device is in landscape mode, with the device upright and the Home button on the right.

items.name: var isLandscape: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the user interface is currently presented in a landscape orientation.

items.name: var isPortrait: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the user interface is currently presented in a portrait orientation.
